name: ZZ's MiniBrief4-DefeatTheDragon
description:
【Warning】：Don't turn on the full screen and make sure that the screen zoom ratio is 100%

UI based game!

  • Use LeftMouseButton to Hit the dragon! （Attacking the head is twice the damage to the body）
  • Hold RightMouseButton to Block the attack！（Block red dots for successful defense）
  • Click Potion to restore HP.

Be the fastest dragon slayer!

BabyMode：

  • Bigger Shield
  • Fewer Injury
  • Slower Dragon's Attack
  • Quicker Potion Cooldown
